LanguageData.Alien_Centaur.label: Centaur
LanguageData.Alien_Centaur.description: The result of extensive gene modding done by the ultra-wealthy as a hobby, now recognised as a distinct species. Despite their equine appearance, centaurs are omnivorous.
LanguageData.Alien_Centaur.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Centaur.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Centaur.tools.2.label: hooves
